title: Reverend
desc:
Post 53
***Baptize** (2x, Charge 100%)*
Tonight, your target's defense power will be increased by 0.6x and they will gain roleblock immunity. You may only use this ability once on each player.
***Sprinkle Holy Water** (1x)*
All Town/Mafia players who placed below you will gain 0.1x additional defense power. This ability is astral.
***Exorcise** (2x, Locked)*
Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Your target gains immunity from negative astral actions.
***Pray** (1x)*
Tonight, you will have 1.5x base defense power. This ability is astral and cannot be roleblocked.
